title: Trundle is a good support? How does that work?
body:
I've been hearing from various sources that Trundle can be a good alternative for people looking to spice up the supp role.

The arguments I've been given were about his Q stealing AD and about his potential to catch ADCs with his zone and pillar.

I have difficulties though imagining this working in practice.

Has anybody any experience with this and if so what is your opinion on Trundle supp?
